subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
Architecture
organizations: Chambers Bay Golf Course (University Place, Wash)
lead_paragraph: After several days, if not weeks, of practice rounds, the United States Open begins Thursday, and the field is still plotting the appropriate approach to the eight-year-old Chambers Bay design.
snippet: After several days, if not weeks, of practice rounds, the United States Open begins Thursday, and the field is still plotting the appropriate approach to the eight-year-old Chambers Bay design.
